1.content:
"Another slow day.." An elderly women sighed laying her head on the counter.
It's been a year since she opened, and the amount of people coming in wasn't that impressive for her liking.
Her shop, In the Name of Love, was a simple costume shop. Sure it sounded like a sex shop but she liked it! And that is what mattered right?
With a grunt she closed her eyes and muttered to herself. "Maybe I should just close up early."
It was at that moment that the bell above her door chimed. "Um, hello? A friend of mine recommended this place for a costume."
Looking up the women saw....


Daniel: 22 years old Caucasian , 6'5" height, 189 lbs. Short blonde hair, blue eyes athletic build and a popular guy of sorts.

Maria: 34 years old Latina, 5'7" height, 172 lbs. Long brown hair, hazel eyes with a curvy shape to her, a slight need to be in control more.

Tak: 19 years old Asian, 5'11" height, 168 lbs. Short black hair, green eyes with lithe build. Out going zanny personality.

Amy: 24 years old Italian, 5'3" height, 160 lbs. Long red hair, brown eyes with curvy full hip shape. More dominate maternal figure.
1.title: Who's going to the party?

11.content:
Looking around the store, Daniel scratched his cheek. It felt odd for him to be in a store called In the Name of Love, felt kind of... dirty.
What if one of his friends saw him walk in? Then again a friend recommended the place.
Being at 6'5" he stood out in the colorful store. His broad shoulders and chest filled out his jersey while a small bit of facial hair sat on his upper lip.
The elderly women grinned from ear to ear as she saw the man enter her store. "Ah welcome welcome!" She jumped down from her chair and moved over to him. "I see, what did your friend send you here for?"
Daniel rubbed his head as he looked down at her. "Ah yes well, he has this party coming up tonight and I need a costume. He said that this place was full of them."
"Oh yes, lots of costumes!" She beamed, moving around the store she looked at him, then got an idea. "But no ordinary costume will do for you! No no!" She chuckled, digging behind the counter.
This was a little odd for Daniel, but he needed something before tonight. "Well, you seem to know what your doing Ma'am. What do I need?"
She grinned pulling out a plain white box from under the counter. "You need this!"
"What is it?"
"This is what you need. Perfect costume." She waved her hand in the air.
Well his friend told him that it was a good place to get what he needed. "How much?"
"Fifty dollar."
His eyes went wide at this price. "Fifty dollars!?"
Nodding the women crossed her arms. "You want or not?"
With a grunting nod Daniel pulled his wallet out and put the money on the counter, taking the box walking out muttering under his breath.
At home though, he tossed the box his table. "This thing better be worth it."
Pulling a knife out, he cut open the sides of the box. Inside was...

15.content:
A young looking woman in her mid 20s walked into the store. Her hair was a golden red that laid down against her fair skin. She was wearing dark sunglasses and her clothes looked more like a casual goth then just a normal girl. She looked over to the counter seeing an elderly woman perk up and move to meet her. "Hello, I hope I'm not bothering you on your break," Xiena replied as she looked to the woman who stood about 5'3"; a good six inches shorter then herself.
"No, no! Not at all. Please come in and have a look at what I have," the elderly woman replied.
Xiena gave a smile and took off her dark sun glasses to see better in the store. Her eyes were two different colors which caught the woman's gaze; the right eye was a forest green and the left a fire blue. "My friend said they had asked for a particular costume for me. Said it goes great with my eyes," Xiena replied looking at the women's costumes hanging near by.

Witha gentle shake of her head the elderly women grinned wide and went to her counter, "Ah! Yes, it would seem no ordinary costume would compliment you."
Xiena looked amused though she followed slowly to look at the other things in the store, "Hope they warned you my bust is bigger then it seems."
"Your what? Oh you mean your breast. Well don't worry this costume will fit you don't you worry," the woman replied bringing a rather plane box and putting it on the counter. It was large enough for just about any costume to fit if folded right.
Xiena went to lift the lid for a peek when the woman softly guided the lid back down, "I was told to not let you see it till you bought it."
"Alright," Xiena replied looking now curious and slightly worried as to what it was, "How much then?"
"That will be Fifty dollars," The woman replied holding out her hand.
Xiena smirked, "Now I know why they told me to bring more then my pocket change. Well may I also get those boots by the door?"
The woman smiled, "Of corse those are sixty-five."
Xiena shrugged and moved to collect the boots; they were knee high laced boots with a belt buckle at the top and a decorative strap that wrapped from the top the foot to under the heel. Bringing them to the counter Xiena pulled out the two c-notes she just collected from the bank before coming to the store. The elderly woman boxed the boots and put both boxes in a bag before then giving Xiena her change.

Xiena left the store curious of her new costume though wanting to get home before seeing it. She tucked the bag into her side car buckling it before sitting on her custom bike and riding off for home. Once she was home and parked her bike in her garage she choose to give a peak at her new costume.
15.title: Xiena

151.content:
In the box was a white almost sheer dress that had many pieces of jewelry. Xiena took it to her living room and opened it more to look at the pieces of the costume. It was very greek in design and matched more for that which the oracles often wore. But the part that made her say 'Oh Crap' at first sight was the runes on the large neck piece. Not many knew that Vikings had ever reached Greece let alone claim some its females.

The Runes were those of Odin and his wife whom Xiena knew to be the Queen and head Valkyrie. Xiena didn't mind that it was something representing a warrior as much as it was representing some one from a Myth that often clashed with her beliefs in not so friendly manner. She looked at the whole outfit and sighed, "At least its a silver base the a gold one. Looks like I'm taking the car though."

Xiena got dressed and added a pair of silver heels with the shin covers that came with the outfit. Under the sheer cloth she wore a white thong and a second white split tongue skirt to feel less exposed. She also had on her silver and leather brown corset to support her large bust as well as to avoid showing off her nipples.

With a pause in the mirror she looked at her curves in the costume. Though loose up top it did compliment her eyes well. She then began to do a light touch of makeup to bring out a more natural beauty on her face and neck. Though she had to go heavy with concealer on her right shoulder to hide the long scar and smooth the skin tone much easier. She was not sure why this outfit was chosen but with luck no one would hit on her in a drunken stoop.

Xiena went for her car she her phone rang, "Hello?"
"Hello Miss BloodStone, would you like a ride through magic?" A voice asked on the other end.
"No thank you. Me and Magic tend to have disagreements but I would like a ride to the party. Can I assume you are outside my home?"
"Yes you can, bring a coat when you come out," the voice replied.
Xiena smiled and looked out her window to see them sitting in a carriage with two strong brown horses waiting, "Alright Mike, I'll be right there."
Xiena hung up the phone and though she wanted her faithful black Duster she chose her foe-fur wolf coat. She then took her small dagger and tucked it in her chest, 'never know when you'll need it' she thought.
As she met Mike out side she saw his costume, "And what are you?"
"I'm Odin, the all Father," Mike said proudly.
"So then you picked my outfit?" Xiena replied as she got into the carriage with his help.
"Well I thought you'd make a very sexy Frea, I was right too~" Mike replied getting in on the other side to drive the carriage.

info.brief_description: It's time for Halloween. But what do you wear? Better yet, what happens?
info.description:
Alright so this follows a wide variety of characters. Four main people, two guys, two girls. And a fifth choice if you want to add your own people and start it your way.
A list of people will be inside, and each one will have a variety of choices for costumes and choices.
The main people that will be added for the start will be there waiting for what happens after they take it home. They'll be given a white box, but whats inside the box?
I don't want to see any chapters just end. I wanna see this keep going for as long as it can.
Keep the weirdness going!
Just don't get too... weird.

You wanna make a guy change gender? Cool. Wanna have some inflation? Sweetness. Gay love/sex? By all means. Make it trashy if you want!
Just make sure it's well written is my only request. Not a whole lot of errors and such. Something that will keep people reading. No text talk, no one liners. You know?
Other then that, I'll start it, have fun!

Be noted when it comes to what will be inside, I'll make if very oblivious because I want you to decide what is inside. A mystery of sorts! So when those chapters are made, you'll be surprised at what people say.
